mapper.select: select o.org_name, o.sort, a.area_name, o.create_time, o.update_time from sys_organization o join sys_area a on o.sys_area_id = a.id join sys_organization_role sor on o.id = sor.sys_organization_id join sys_role r on r.id = sor.sys_organization_id join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.sys_role_id join sys_user u on ur.sys_user_id = u.id where u.account = #{account}
